SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]

) AS [t] ON [p].[Id] = [t].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[CreatorName], [t].[Description], [t].[EndDate], [t].[Name], [t].[StartDate], [t].[Status], [t].[Id0], [t].[AccessFailedCount], [t].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t].[Email], [t].[EmailConfirmed], [t].[FirstName], [t].[LastName], [t].[LockoutEnabled], [t].[LockoutEnd], [t].[NormalizedEmail], [t].[NormalizedUserName], [t].[PasswordHash], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t].[SecurityStamp], [t].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t].[UserName], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[AccessFailedCount], [t0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t0].[Email], [t0].[EmailConfirmed], [t0].[FirstName], [t0].[LastName], [t0].[LockoutEnabled], [t0].[LockoutEnd], [t0].[NormalizedEmail], [t0].[NormalizedUserName], [t0].[PasswordHash], [t0].[PhoneNumber], [t0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t0].[SecurityStamp], [t0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t0].[UserName]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]

    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]

    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__projectId_0
) AS [t]

ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p0].[ProjectId]

    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]

    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]

) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId], [t].[Id], [t].[AccessFailedCount], [t].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t].[Email], [t].[EmailConfirmed], [t].[FirstName], [t].[LastName], [t].[LockoutEnabled], [t].[LockoutEnd], [t].[NormalizedEmail], [t].[NormalizedUserName], [t].[PasswordHash], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t].[SecurityStamp], [t].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t].[UserName]
FROM [Projects] AS [p]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [p].[Id] = [t].[ProjectId]

INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]

INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[CreatorName], [t].[Description], [t].[EndDate], [t].[Name], [t].[StartDate], [t].[Status], [t].[Id0], [t].[AccessFailedCount], [t].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t].[Email], [t].[EmailConfirmed], [t].[FirstName], [t].[LastName], [t].[LockoutEnabled], [t].[LockoutEnd], [t].[NormalizedEmail], [t].[NormalizedUserName], [t].[PasswordHash], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t].[SecurityStamp], [t].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t].[UserName], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[AccessFailedCount], [t0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t0].[Email], [t0].[EmailConfirmed], [t0].[FirstName], [t0].[LastName], [t0].[LockoutEnabled], [t0].[LockoutEnd], [t0].[NormalizedEmail], [t0].[NormalizedUserName], [t0].[PasswordHash], [t0].[PhoneNumber], [t0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t0].[SecurityStamp], [t0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t0].[UserName]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (

    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]

    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId], [t].[Id], [t].[AccessFailedCount], [t].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t].[Email], [t].[EmailConfirmed], [t].[FirstName], [t].[LastName], [t].[LockoutEnabled], [t].[LockoutEnd], [t].[NormalizedEmail], [t].[NormalizedUserName], [t].[PasswordHash], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t].[SecurityStamp], [t].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t].[UserName]
FROM [Projects] AS [p]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p1].[ProjectId], [p1].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p1]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p1].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [p].[Id] = [t].[ProjectId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__userId_0)

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)

SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId], [t].[Id], [t].[AccessFailedCount], [t].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t].[Email], [t].[EmailConfirmed], [t].[FirstName], [t].[LastName], [t].[LockoutEnabled], [t].[LockoutEnd], [t].[NormalizedEmail], [t].[NormalizedUserName], [t].[PasswordHash], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t].[SecurityStamp], [t].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t].[UserName]
FROM [Projects] AS [p]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p1].[ProjectId], [p1].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p1]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p1].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [p].[Id] = [t].[ProjectId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__userId_0)
ORDER BY [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId], [t].[Id], [t].[AccessFailedCount], [t].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t].[Email], [t].[EmailConfirmed], [t].[FirstName], [t].[LastName], [t].[LockoutEnabled], [t].[LockoutEnd], [t].[NormalizedEmail], [t].[NormalizedUserName], [t].[PasswordHash], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t].[SecurityStamp], [t].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t].[UserName]
FROM [Projects] AS [p]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p1].[ProjectId], [p1].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p1]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p1].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [p].[Id] = [t].[ProjectId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__userId_0)
ORDER BY [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId]

    SELECT TOP(1) [t].[Id], [t].[AssignedUserId], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[Description], [t].[DueDate], [t].[Priority], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[Status], [t].[Title], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CreatorId] AS [CreatorId0], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description] AS [Description0], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status] AS [Status0]
    FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
    INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [t].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t0]
LEFT JOIN [TaskTags] AS [t1] ON [t0].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0], [t1].[TagId]

INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p1].[ProjectId], [p1].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]

INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)

INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]

) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

    FROM [Projects] AS [p]

) AS [t]

    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

    FROM [Projects] AS [p]

    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[CreatorName], [t].[Description], [t].[EndDate], [t].[Name], [t].[StartDate], [t].[Status], [t].[Id0], [t].[AccessFailedCount], [t].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t].[Email], [t].[EmailConfirmed], [t].[FirstName], [t].[LastName], [t].[LockoutEnabled], [t].[LockoutEnd], [t].[NormalizedEmail], [t].[NormalizedUserName], [t].[PasswordHash], [t].[PhoneNumber], [t].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t].[SecurityStamp], [t].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t].[UserName], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id], [t0].[AccessFailedCount], [t0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t0].[Email], [t0].[EmailConfirmed], [t0].[FirstName], [t0].[LastName], [t0].[LockoutEnabled], [t0].[LockoutEnd], [t0].[NormalizedEmail], [t0].[NormalizedUserName], [t0].[PasswordHash], [t0].[PhoneNumber], [t0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t0].[SecurityStamp], [t0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t0].[UserName]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]
    FROM [Projects] AS [p]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (

    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

FROM [sys].[default_constraints] [d]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]

    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]

    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]

FROM [Projects] AS [p]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]

) AS [t] ON [p].[Id] = [t].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = [p0].[ProjectId] AND [p0].[UserId] = @__currentUserId_0)
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[Status], [t].[Priority], [t].[DueDate], [t].[CreatorId], [t].[ProjectId], [p].[Name], [a].[FirstName] + N' ' + [a].[LastName], [t].[AssignedUserId], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[Name], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId], [t1].[Id]
FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [t].[Id] = [t1].[TaskId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t1].[TagId], [t1].[TaskId]

FROM [Projects] AS [p]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProjectId], [p0].[UserId], [a0].[Id], [a0].[AccessFailedCount], [a0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a0].[Email], [a0].[EmailConfirmed], [a0].[FirstName], [a0].[LastName], [a0].[LockoutEnabled], [a0].[LockoutEnd], [a0].[NormalizedEmail], [a0].[NormalizedUserName], [a0].[PasswordHash], [a0].[PhoneNumber], [a0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a0].[SecurityStamp], [a0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a0].[UserName]
    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [p].[Id] = [t].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [p].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[ProjectId], [t].[UserId]

FROM [Tasks] AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [t].[AssignedUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t2].[Name], [t0].[TagId], [t0].[TaskId], [t2].[Id]
    FROM [TaskTags] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [Tags] AS [t2] ON [t0].[TagId] = [t2].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[Id], [p].[CreatorId], [p].[CreatorName], [p].[Description], [p].[EndDate], [p].[Name], [p].[StartDate], [p].[Status], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[FirstName], [a].[LastName], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName]

    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [p].[CreatorId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [p].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (

    FROM [ProjectUsers] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a0] ON [p0].[UserId] = [a0].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ProjectId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[ProjectId], [t0].[UserId]

INNER JOIN [Projects] AS [p] ON [t].[ProjectId] = [p].[Id]
